Class AppController

java.lang.Object
com.tablr.controller.AppController
public class AppController extends Object
AppController is the central coordinator of the application. It acts as a mediator between the UIController, TableController, and the SubwindowController (MainWindow).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AppController()
    Constructs an AppController and initializes all core controllers.
